DOC.brief_summary: The main research question study whether family-based , life-skills focus psychosocial intervention effective reduce psychological distress stigma improve inter-personal relation function among war-affected child Democratic Republic Congo .
DOC.brief_title: A Family-based , Resilience-focused Intervention War-affected Communities North-eastern Democratic Republic Congo
DOC.criteria: Waraffected eastern Democratic Republic Congo Formerly abduct child vulnerable child severe/violent behavioural problem severe learn difficulty
